title: VersioningSchema
description: A schema for defining the semantics for a user-defined method of versioning specificiation.

$comment.description: An ignored comment explaining the schema.

$schema.description: The JSON schema to use for validation. Must link to this JSON schema file.

$id.description: The URL of the schema file.

title.description: A title given to the schema file.

description.description: A brief description of the schema file.

segments.description: The segments that make up the version string.

$comment.description: An ignored comment explaining the segment.

$name.description: A human-readable name for the segment.

required.description: Whether the segment is required for a well-formed version string.

order.description: What order the segment appears in the version string.

sort.description: The relative ordering effect of this segment on the version string.
sort.$comment: Value must be one of: -1 for preceding, 0 for no effect, or 1 for succeeding.

prefix.description: The character(s) that delimit this segment from its preceding segment.

breaking.description: Whether an increment to this segment represents a breaking change for users.
breaking.$comment: A value of 'null' represents no effect on the determination as a breaking change or not.
